kw.msg:
<!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en" >
<head > <title ></title > <meta charset="utf-8" > <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" > <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.1.3/css/bootstrap.min.css" > <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js" ></script > <script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.1.3/js/bootstrap.min.js" ></script > <style > html { height : 100%; }
iframe { height : 100%; width : 100%; border : 0px; }
body { min-height : 100%; }
.dropdown-submenu { position : relative; }
.dropdown-submenu .dropdown-menu { top : 0; left : 50%; margin-top : -1px; } </style > </head >
<body > <!-- Debug output shows incoming template data
{"title":"Ufp Env Handlebars - Ufp Menu","brand":{"label":"UFP Menu","color":"primary"},"welcome":{"entries":[{"texts":[{"title":"Welcome to this example","text":"Welcome to this example"}]}]},"menu":[{"link":"https://frontendsolutions.de/","color":"btn-primary","children":[{"link":"https://frontendsolutions.de/#/enterprise","color":"btn-primary","label":"Welcome"},{"link":"https://frontendsolutions.de/#/startup","color":"btn-secondary","label":"More"}],"label":"UFP"},{"link":"https://github.com/FrontendSolutionsGmbH","color":"btn-secondary","label":"github.com","target":"ufp github"},{"link":"https://frontendsolutions.de/","color":"btn-secondary","label":"MENU 2"},{"link":"https://frontendsolutions.de/","color":"btn-secondary","label":"MENU 3"}],"callback":{"some":"json"}} --> <nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-light navbar-light bg-light"
> <a class="navbar-brand " href="/" target="_self" >UFP Menu</a >
<div class="collapse navbar-collapse" > <ul class="navbar-nav mr-auto" > <li class="nav-item dropdown " > <a class="nav-link dropdown-toggle " href="#" id="navbarDropdown" role="button" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" > UFP </a > <div class="dropdown-menu" aria-labelledby="navbarDropdown" >
<!-- NO CHILDREN, NORMAL LI -->
<a class="dropdown-item " target="content" href="https://frontendsolutions.de/#/enterprise" >Welcome</a >
<!-- NO CHILDREN, NORMAL LI -->
<a class="dropdown-item " target="content" href="https://frontendsolutions.de/#/startup" >More</a > </div > </li > <li class="nav-item" > <a class="nav-link " target="ufp github" href="https://github.com/FrontendSolutionsGmbH" >github.com
</a > </li > <li class="nav-item" > <a class="nav-link " target="content" href="https://frontendsolutions.de/" >MENU 2
</a > </li > <li class="nav-item" > <a class="nav-link " target="content" href="https://frontendsolutions.de/" >MENU 3
</a > </li > </ul > </div >
</nav >
<div style="width:100%;height:calc(100% - 3em);position:absolute;padding-top:1em" > <iframe name="content" src="/welcome.html" ></iframe > </div >
<script > $(document).ready(function () { $('.dropdown-submenu a.test').on("click", function (e) { $(this).next('ul').toggle(); e.stopPropagation(); e.preventDefault(); });
}); </script > </body >
</html >

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" >

    <head >
        <title ></title >
        <meta charset="utf-8" >
        <meta name="viewport"
              content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" >
        <link rel="stylesheet"
              href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.1.3/css/bootstrap.min.css" >
        <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js" ></script >
        <script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.1.3/js/bootstrap.min.js" ></script >
        <style >
            html {
                height : 100%;
            }

            iframe {
                height : 100%;
                width  : 100%;
                border : 0px;
            }

            body {
                min-height : 100%;
            }

            .dropdown-submenu {
                position : relative;
            }

            .dropdown-submenu .dropdown-menu {
                top        : 0;
                left       : 50%;
                margin-top : -1px;
            }
        </style >
    </head >







    <body >
        <!--
            Debug output shows incoming template data

            {"title":"Ufp Env Handlebars - Ufp Menu","brand":{"label":"UFP Menu","color":"primary"},"welcome":{"entries":[{"texts":[{"title":"Welcome to UFP Env Handlebars","text":"This is the default value for the ${CFG_WELCOME_TEXT} env value, override to set new. The title is controlled using the ${CFG_WELCOME_TILE} env property"}]}]},"menu":[{"link":"http://www.froso.de","color":"w3-blue","label":"SERVICE 2"}],"callback":{"some":"json"}}
         -->
        <nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-light navbar-light bg-light"

        >
            <a class="navbar-brand  "
               href="/"
               target="_self" >UFP Menu</a >
            
                <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" >
                    <ul class="navbar-nav mr-auto" >
                        <li class="nav-item" >
                            <a class="nav-link  "
                               target="content"
                               href="http://www.froso.de" >SERVICE 2
            
                            </a >
                        </li >
                    </ul >
                </div >
            


        </nav >

        <div style="width:100%;height:calc(100% - 3em);position:absolute;padding-top:1em" >
            <iframe name="content"
                    src="/welcome.html" ></iframe >
        </div >

        <script >
            $(document).ready(function () {
                $('.dropdown-submenu a.test').on("click", function (e) {
                    $(this).next('ul').toggle();
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    e.preventDefault();
                });

            });
        </script >
    </body >

</html >
